TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GestureRecognitionResult extends System.Object

remarks.format:
## Remarks A<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>包含<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>以及 likeliness 程度，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>正確識別筆勢。
使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>屬性來判斷 likeliness 的層級，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>正確識別筆勢。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何在識別手勢<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>名`inkCanvas1`且其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件已連線至程式碼中的事件處理常式。
[!code-csharp[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationGesture As ApplicationGesture
public: property System::Windows::Ink::ApplicationGesture ApplicationGesture { System::Windows::Ink::ApplicationGesture get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
